prompt: Create a 404 Not Found page with a gradient background transitioning from light blue (Colors.blue[100]) to white. Display '404' in a bold, teal-colored font (Colors.teal[700], font size 68). Show 'Page Not Found' as a subtitle in dark blue (Colors.blue[800], font size 26, semi-bold). Include a message 'The page you’re trying to access doesn’t exist.' in gray (Colors.grey[700], font size 16). Add a teal 'Back to Home' button with sharp rectangular edges and white text. Use a Column layout with mainAxisAlignment.center and crossAxisAlignment.start, aligning content to the left with padding of 20.0 on the left and right. Wrap the Column in a Container with the gradient background, and use a Scaffold with a transparent background.
